DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of preoperative immunonutrition on complications and length of hospital stay in patients with pancreatic cancer undergoing elective surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Oral Immunonutrition for Patients With Pancreatic Cancer Undergoing Elective Surgery - Effect on Complications and Length of Hospital Stay
DOC.criteria: Men and women referred to treatment at Surgical Gastroenterology Clinic C, Ward 2122 for pancreatic cancer Age > 18 years. Age < 18 years Pregnant and lactating women Persons who cannot understand and/or speak Danish Renal dysfunction Milk allergy Participants are excluded if elective surgery is not indicated after all
DOC.keyword: Postoperative complications and length of hospital stay after major gastrointestinal (GI) elective surgery.
